We hope this offer meets your expectations and allows us to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Looking forward to your positive response.

(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
